features.title: Comfort Protocol

longDescription: Lip enhancement at Dr. SNA Clinic is never one-size-fits-all. We analyse your facial proportions, smile dynamics, and hydration levels before selecting premium HA fillers that deliver soft volume, crisp borders, or subtle symmetry tweaks. Expect a bespoke plan, micro-cannula comfort, and results that feel like you—only more confident.

faq.answer: No. We layer filler strategically to enhance your natural anatomy, never overpower it.
faq.question: Will my lips look fake?
How long does swelling last?
faq.answer: Most swelling subsides within 48 hours; full settling occurs by day seven.

overview.title: Our Approach
highlights: Micro-cannula + needle combination for less bruising
overview.content: We focus on harmony—not trend-driven exaggeration. Whether you want hydration, Cupid’s bow definition, or a subtle Russian-inspired lift, we map your lips with HA fillers tailored to texture and longevity. Expect soft, flexible movement and precise symmetry from every angle.
